page.title: 10A DAY IN A LIFE OF ?
page.content: {EMMA DAVEY & FAMILY {5:30}WE GET UP AND HAVE BREAKFAST. {6:00 }WE NOW LOAD THE CAR WITH A SUITCASE WITH OUR BRIDLES IN,WE HAVE TO CHECK A LONG LIST WHICH MUM KEEPS SO THAT WE DONT FORGET ANYTHING. {6:20}WE HAVE TO BANDAGE THE PONIES LEGS SO THAT THEY DONT HURT THEMSELVES ON THE WAY TO THE SHOW.WE ALSO HAVE TO CHECK THAT THE PONIES HAVE LOST ANY PLAITS OR HAVE GOT ANY STABLE MARKS. {6:40}WE NOW COME UP FROM THE FIELDS AND I GET CHANGED INTO MY SHOW JACKETS,JODPURS,SHIRT,TIE AND TIE PIN. {7:00}GRANDAD NOW TOWS THE TRAILER DOWN TO OUTSIDE THE HOUSE. {7:30}WE ARE ON OUR WAY TO THE SHOW,I OFTEN GET BUTTERFLIES NOW. {8:30}WE HAVE JUST GOT AT THE SHOW AND WE ARE VERY EXICTED. {8:45}WE RIDE OUR PONIES TO WORK THEM IN BEFORE OUR FRIST CLASS.
